'''Replica Ancient Otogi Crate''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Replica Ancient Otogi Crate is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest north of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Autake Plains]] on Tsurumi Island. It is normally available on the second day of Tsurumi Island's [[Tsurumi Island#Three-Day Cycle|Three-Day Cycle]]; however, it is possible for Remarkable Chests to appear on different days if the cycle becomes desynced.
